q: Judge Louis Walsh confirmed both Simon Cowell and Cheryl Cole have quit the show in favour of working on the American version, leaving a spot free for Sharon Osbourne . Louis Walsh hinted to the News Of The World: It will be me and Dannii Minogue with two more people. Sharon Osbourne and Dannii Minogue first fell out when they both starred in the show in 2007, with Dannii Minogue later claiming she had been bullied.
